title: When in Urf, do as the Urfians do.
body:
When you queue for urf with your two best friends, and you all get your absolute main champs! _(although if Lulu got Evelynn it would have been even even more perfect, but Lulu is just as impressive)_.




Yup.... we still lost that game xD



__________________


On a side note: Why is Azir's W cooldown higher than normal in Urf instead of lower, early on? It gave me a hell of a heart attack when I saw it! 25+ seconds between soldiers is not exactly ultra rapid fire :P

Happened twice now.

https://i.gyazo.com/29e4ed8c841cd889fc7df9ca44ca3694.png

replies.body:
I was disappointed at Zyra's passive in URF as well, same sort of thing.

On another note, where's all the honour? I usually have at least half the players displaying lvl 3-4 honour (I'm lvl 4 myself), do I get queued preferentially?

Yea, all passives seem to not be affected.
I still need to wait 3 minutes between Azir towers. _(which is kinda annoying, because the game moves at such a faster pace.)_

As for the honours, I don't know, I did notice that after I got lvl 3, I started to see a lot more people with them _(the same with the old honour system too)_, but I don't know wether thats because the system does it that way, or wether it's just because everyone got it all at the same time.
I think riot nerfed azir's sand soldiers last time during the urf event so he doesn't abuse them.

I think that was only the number of soldiers they nerfed.

and the cooldown didn't stay this long. But i have no idea why it was this long to begin with.
